original_title: 続・未亡人下宿？ エロすぎちゃってごめんなさい
overview: A sequel to "Widows Boarding House? I'll Lend You a Valley". Yuko manages the boarding house by herself before her husband. She is thinking of closing the boarding house because of the deficit, but she comforted herself in front of the deceased because of the loneliness of her husband. Sumire Nagai and Iroha Narimiya gorgeous actresses co-star.
title: Zoku mibôjin geshuku? Ero sugichatte gomen nasai
